mapper.insert: insert into f_fileinfo (file_num, file_name, extension, included_folder_num, file_save_path) values(#{file_num}, #{file_name}, #{extension}, #{included_folder_num}, #{file_save_path})
mapper.select: select file_name, extension, file_save_path from f_fileinfo where included_folder_num in (select folder_num from f_folder where p_no = #{p_no} and folder_path like #{folder_path}||'%')
mapper.update: update f_fileinfo set included_folder_num = (select folder_num from f_folder where p_no = #{p_no} and folder_path = #{folder_path} ), file_save_path = #{folder_path} || substr(file_save_path, instr(file_save_path, '/', -1)+1) where file_num = #{file_num}

update f_fileinfo set file_save_path = substr(file_save_path, 0, instr(#{old_path},'/',-1,2)) || #{name} ||substr(file_save_path, instr(#{old_path},'/',-1,1)) where file_save_path like #{old_path} || '%'

update f_fileinfo set file_save_path = #{destination_folder_path} || substr(file_save_path, instr(#{folder_to_move},'/',-1,2)+1) where included_folder_num in( select folder_num from f_folder where p_no = #{p_no} and folder_path like #{folder_to_move}||'%' )
